mapper.insert: insert into t_rlation (ID, UserID, CommunityID, Position,Department) values (uuid(), #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{communityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ID, UserID, CommunityID, Position,Department from t_rlation where UserID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, UserID, CommunityID, Position,Department from t_rlation where CommunityID = #{communityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, UserID, CommunityID, Position,Department from t_rlation
